name: DICEMANCER (Antidissmist, Haasiophis, natanco)
description:
Dicemancer is a combat-platformer where you throw your dice to attack, teleport, freeze, and blast your way to victory! 

But beware, you’ve dropped your dice bag, mixing up your spells big-time! Will you make it through?

Created for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam in 48 hours

A game by Antidissmist, Haasio, & Natanco

  -   Listen to the Soundtrack!

  -   Speedun record time to beat is 1:26:21 (start button to bottom of pit)

  -   Feedback and ratings are greatly appreciated!
